name: Hammer Reloaded 2
description: The city streets are packed with bad guys. Who you gonna call? That's right, it's THE HAMMER! He'll straighten them out with his shotgun. In this all new third person shooter game take out bad agents and level up with a shotgun or machine gun. You can even get a jet pack! Don't have to worry about wasting all your time playing to get money as money is easy peasy to obtain in this game while having loads of fun!
